parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Environment

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> A getter for [[setFog]] (Alt Syntax). Returns extended params for the fog

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''fogParams'''

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - in format [[setFog]]: [fogValue, fogDecay, fogBase]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_fog = [[fogParams]]</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setFog]], [[fog]], [[fogForecast]]
</value></part></template>
